name: Slayer's Feint

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Dex 15, Acrobatic or slayer level 1st, Combat Expertise, Acrobatics 1 rank.

sections.text: You can use Acrobatics instead of Bluff to feint in combat.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You rely on your deceptive speed and agility instead of trickery to catch your opponents unprepared.
